DOC.brief_summary: This study comparison client outcomes two different type psychotherapy treatment . In one condition client receive treatment-as-usual ( TAU ) ; therapy would normally receive . In condition client receive treatment-as-usual addition therapist access empirical feedback client progress . Clients feedback condition fill weekly online questionnaire , therapist access website feed back result questionnaire . The purpose study understand impact provide feedback therapist . Participating therapist 4 site offer client opportunity participate , participate client randomly assign either condition . This result representative sample client seek treatment 4 Chicago-area clinic .
DOC.criteria: Client seek therapy one 4 participate site For Individual therapy : client must consent complete pretest battery first therapy session For couple therapy : client must consent complete pretest battery first therapy session For family therapy : least one client must consent complete pretest battery first therapy session Clients must 12 year age old Clients must able read ( English Spanish ) 6th grade level Clients 12 year age Clients incapable read 6th grade level Clients blind , sufficiently impaired sight unable read question web portal
